eu.bavenir.ogwapi.restapi.services

Class AgentsAgidObjects

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.restlet.resource.Resource
      • org.restlet.resource.ServerResource
        • eu.bavenir.ogwapi.restapi.services.AgentsAgidObjects

  • public class AgentsAgidObjects
extends org.restlet.resource.ServerResource
    This class implements a ServerResource interface for following Gateway API calls: URL: [server]:[port]/api/agents/{agid}/objects METHODS: GET, POST, PUT SPECIFICATION: @see Gateway API ATTRIBUTES: agid - VICINITY Identifier of the Agent, that is in control of the Adapters (e.g. 1dae4326-44ae-4b98-bb75-15aa82516cc3).
    Author:
    sulfo

      • represent

        @Get
public org.restlet.representation.Representation represent()
        Returns the list of IoT objects registered under given Agent.
        Returns:
        All VICINITY identifiers of objects registered under specified agent.

      • accept

        @Post(value="json")
public org.restlet.representation.Representation accept(org.restlet.representation.Representation entity)
        Register the IoT object(s) of the underlying eco-system e.g. devices, VA service.
        Parameters:
        entity - Representation of the incoming JSON. List of IoT thing descriptions that are to be registered (from request).
        Returns:
        All VICINITY identifiers of objects registered under VICINITY Gateway by this call.

      • store

public org.restlet.representation.Representation store(org.restlet.representation.Representation entity)
        Update the thing descriptions of objects registered under the Agent.

      • heavyweightUpdate

        private org.restlet.representation.Representation heavyweightUpdate(org.restlet.representation.Representation json,
                                                                    java.util.logging.Logger logger,
                                                                    org.apache.commons.configuration2.XMLConfiguration config)
        Update the thing descriptions of objects registered under the Agent.
        Parameters:
        json - Representation of the incoming JSON. List of IoT thing descriptions that are to be updated (from request).
        logger - Logger to be used.
        Returns:
        The list of approved devices to be registered in agent configuration. Approved devices means only devices, that passed the validation in semantic repository and their instances were created.

      • storeObjects

        private org.restlet.representation.Representation storeObjects(org.restlet.representation.Representation json,
                                                               java.util.logging.Logger logger,
                                                               org.apache.commons.configuration2.XMLConfiguration config)
        Register the IoT object(s) of the underlying eco system e.g. devices, VA service.
        Parameters:
        json - Representation of the incoming JSON. List of IoT thing descriptions that are to be registered (from request).
        logger - Logger to be used.
        Returns:
        All VICINITY identifiers of objects registered the Agent by this call.

      • getAgentObjects

        private org.restlet.representation.Representation getAgentObjects(java.lang.String agid,
                                                                  java.util.logging.Logger logger,
                                                                  org.apache.commons.configuration2.XMLConfiguration config)
        Retrieves the list of IoT objects registered under given Agent from the Neighbourhood Manager.
        Parameters:
        agid - The ID of the Agent in question.
        logger - Logger to be used.
        Returns:
        All VICINITY identifiers of objects registered under specified agent.
